! parse
err 'calling raw API endpoint svc.API from another endpoint is not yet supported'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"
    "net/http"
)

//encore:api public raw
func API(w http.ResponseWriter, req *http.Request) { }

//encore:api public
func NonRaw(ctx context.Context) error {
    API(nil, nil)
    return nil
}

-- want: errors --
